title: Bug 14047: StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
OB: The StyledText widget is experiencing inefficient redraws during text changes when word wrap is enabled.
EB: The StyledText widget should perform efficient redraws during text changes with word wrap enabled.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Enable word wrap in the StyledText widget.
2. Make changes to the text.
3. Observe the inefficient redraws occurring.

Additionally, add the following line to the 'performPaint' method in the StyledText widget to see the redraws occurring:
System.out.println('lineCount ' + lineCount + ', paintY ' + paintY + ', renderHeight ' + renderHeight);
